Articles.Content:
Hi All, 

Experiencing a strange bug where on some (not all) of my vessels, I suddenly cannot toggle SAS (i.e. I could yesterday). When I hit T it goes on for a fraction of a second, thats it. Doesn't change if I hold down the key. 

I'm using RemoteTech which I feel might be relevant here. Anyone experienced this before? 

http://imgur.com/8LAukQ6
Make sure that all RT flight computer programs are closed. RT overrides the SAS.
Could also be mech jeb, having smart ass on.
